title: Progressive Web Apps? No, we are building Alien Web Apps
description: Progressive Web Apps? No, we are building Alien Web Apps

title: Real Transactions are Serializable
description: Most databases offer a choice of several transaction isolation levels, offering a tradeoff between correctness and performance. However, that performance comes at a price, as developers must study their transactional interactions carefully or risk introducing subtle bugs. CockroachDB provides strong (“SERIALIZABLE”) isolation by default to ensure that your application always sees the data it expects. In this post I'll explain what this means and how insufficient isolation impacts real-world applications.
